sentence.text: We further demonstrated that genetic loss of Fam13a exacerbated obesity-related metabolic disorders, while targeted activation of Fam13a in adipocytes ameliorated it in association with altered adipose tissue insulin sensitivity in mice.

Our data unveiled a previously unknown mechanism in the regulation of adipocyte insulin signaling by Fam13a and identified its significant role in systemic metabolic homeostasis, shedding light on Fam13a as a pharmacotherapeutic target to treat obesity-related metabolic disorders
